annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Sept. 26, 1995, D.C. Law 11-52, § 804, 42 DCR 3684

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary addition of section, see § 504 of the Omnibus Budget Support Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-44, April 28, 1995, 42 DCR 2217) and § 804 of the Omnibus Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-124, July 27, 1995, 42 DCR 4160).
